meanings.sent1: My auntie always brings me candy when she visits.
meanings.sent2: I love spending time with my auntie during the holidays.
meanings.sent3: My auntie told the funniest joke at dinner last night.
meanings.sent4: She is like a warm hug from an auntie on a cold day.
meanings.sent5: The smell of cookies baking reminds me of my auntie's house.

meanings.definition: A term of endearment for a woman who is a close friend or mentor.
meanings.sent1: Thank you, auntie, for always being there for me.
meanings.sent2: My best friend is like an auntie to me, always supportive.
meanings.sent3: My auntie gave me great advice on my school project.
meanings.sent4: She is the auntie of wisdom in our group of friends.
meanings.sent5: I feel safe and loved when my auntie is around.
